activity_details.name: Universal Studios Hollywood Skip-the-Line Ticket
activity_details.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608
highlights: Access to all rides and attractions

activity_details.description: Skip the regular lines and head straight to the fun with this admission ticket to Universal Studios Hollywood. The ticket gives you access to all rides, shows, and attractions at one of Los Angeles' most exciting theme parks.
included: Access to all rides and attractions
important_info: Children aged 2 and under enter free
Outside food and drinks are not permitted
Some rides have height and age restrictions
